name: browser-extension-tbcp
description: How to Build and Publish Browser Extension with Web-Ext Svelte TypeScript Webpack
author: Bootcamp contributors <contributors@bootcamp-project.com>

scripts.package-ffd: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && web-ext build -s dist/firefox-desktop -a artifacts -n firefox-desktop_v$PACKAGE_VERSION.zip -o
